meanings.definition: In view of the fact that; considering that.
meanings.sent1: Whereas it is raining outside, we should bring an umbrella.
meanings.sent2: I like ice cream, whereas my brother prefers cake.
meanings.sent3: Whereas the cat thinks it's the boss, the dog just wants to play.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall, whereas the bush was short and bushy.
meanings.sent5: Whereas the sun shines brightly, the moon glows softly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: On the contrary; while on the contrary.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys spicy food, whereas he prefers mild flavors.
meanings.sent2: I thought the movie was boring, whereas my friend found it exciting.
meanings.sent3: The cat sleeps all day, whereas the dog is always full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was soft and gentle, whereas his was loud and booming.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed beautifully, whereas the weeds grew wildly.
